00007 #include <stdio.h>
00008 #include <stdlib.h>
00009 #include <stdarg.h>
00010 #include "../includes/logger.h"
00011 
00012 char *_LOGGER_IDENTITY = "phidgetmanager";
00013 
00014 /**
00015  * Crude logging function
00016  */
00017 void doLog(int priority, char *message, ...) {
00018 
00019         openlog(_LOGGER_IDENTITY, LOG_PID, LOG_LOCAL1);
00020 
00021         char buffer[2048];
00022         va_list ap;
00023 
00024         va_start(ap, message);
00025                 vsnprintf (buffer, sizeof(buffer), message, ap);
00026         va_end(ap);
00027 
00028         syslog(priority, buffer, NULL);
00029 
00030         closelog();
00031 
00032 }
00033 
00034 void doLogString(int priority, char *message, char *param) {
00035 
00036         openlog(_LOGGER_IDENTITY, LOG_PID, LOG_LOCAL1);
00037 
00038         syslog(priority, message, param);
00039 
00040         closelog();
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 void doLogInteger(int priority, char *message, int param) {
00045 
00046         openlog(_LOGGER_IDENTITY, LOG_PID, LOG_LOCAL1);
00047 
00048         syslog(priority, message, param);
00049 
00050         closelog();
00051 
00052 }// [/doLog]
